item.title: 液化天然气需求向发展中国家转移正在改变市场格局
item.description:

item.title: 意大利至少要到 2026 年才能实现欧盟 3% 的赤字目标
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利至少要到 2026 年才能将预算赤字控制在欧盟规定的 3% 的限额以下，这有可能导致该集团的财政监督机构延长审查时间。【原文：Italy will take until at least 2026 to get its budget deficit below the European Union’s 3% limit, according to people familiar with the matter, potentially earning extended scrutiny from the bloc’s fiscal watchdogs.】

item.title: 特斯拉股价在最近的大跌中跌至 "不成功便成仁 "的水平
item.description: 特斯拉公司周二发布的灾难性销售报告，以及交易员在报告发布前几个月对该公司股票的激进抛售，导致股价暴跌，跌至投资者的临界水平。【原文：Tesla Inc.’s disastrous sales report on Tuesday, and traders’ aggressive selling of the stock in the months leading up to it, have the share price plunging toward a critical level for investors.】

item.title: 新西兰房价 18 个月来首次年度上涨
item.description: 据CoreLogic公司称，新西兰房价在18个月内首次出现年度上涨，有迹象表明今年的经济正在出现初步复苏。【原文：New Zealand posted its first annual gain in house prices in 18 months amid signs that a tentative recovery is under way this year, according to CoreLogic.】

item.title: 最古老的对冲基金策略在 700 亿美元出逃后赢得现金
item.description: 选股型对冲基金在业绩好转后，两年来首次重新受到青睐。【原文：Stockpicking hedge funds are coming back into favor for the first time in two years after a turnaround in their performance.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会贿赂部门调查科技公司使用承包商的情况
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国证券交易委员会正在询问上市科技公司与美国境外分销商和其他商业伙伴的关系，以根除可能存在的腐败现象。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission is asking publicly traded tech companies about their relationships with distributors and other business partners outside the US in a push to root out possible corruption, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法国基金超越 "华丽七重奏 "击败竞争对手
item.description: 没有 "华丽七侠"，你也能打败众人。这是一对法国小基金公司的观点，它们今年的业绩超过了 99% 的同行。【原文：You can beat the crowd without the Magnificent Seven. That’s the view of a pair of pint-sized French funds, which have outclassed 99% of their peers this year.】

item.title: 印度石油公司与国家核公司就小型反应堆进行谈判
item.description: 国营印度石油公司（Indian Oil Corp.印度石油有限公司正在与印度原子能垄断公司就建造小型核电机组进行初步谈判。【原文：State-run Indian Oil Corp. Ltd. is in preliminary talks with India’s atomic power monopoly to build small nuclear units, an early-stage technology seen as a cost-effective alternative to larger plants.】

item.title: 中国央行更加关注经济的短期困境
item.description: 中国央行誓言从现有的促进增长政策中获得更多收益，承认尽管今年出现了一些改善迹象，但经济仍受到需求低迷和情绪不振的影响。【原文：China’s central bank vowed to get more out of its existing pro-growth policies, acknowledging that the economy is suffering from subdued demand and downbeat sentiment despite some signs of improvement this year.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。市场在等待鲍威尔的言论，就业数据提供了薪资预览，花旗集团策略师称美股有恢复涨势的空间。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Markets wait for Powell comments, jobs data gives a payrolls preview and Citigroup strategists say US stocks have room to resume their gains. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 皮尔-亨特称英国小盘股指数即将消亡
item.description: 伦敦股票经纪公司 Peel Hunt Ltd 警告说，如果目前的收购活动水平持续下去，而首次公开募股市场又无法反弹，那么到 2028 年，英国小盘股指数将不复存在。【原文：An index of UK small-cap stocks will cease to exist by 2028 if the current level of takeover activity persists and the initial public offering market fails to rebound, London stockbroker Peel Hunt Ltd warned.】

item.title: 蓝猫途鹰将在最新保险交易中收购 Kuvare 资产管理公司

item.title: Pimco 提升债券押注 美联储减息幅度将低于全球同行
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co）的安德鲁-鲍尔斯（Andrew Balls）说，债券市场押注美联储未来几年降息幅度将低于其他主要央行的时机已经成熟。【原文：The time is ripe for bond-market bets that the Federal Reserve will lower interest rates less than other major central banks in the next couple years, says Andrew Balls at Pacific Investment Management Co.】

item.title: NFL 头盔制造商 Riddell 从 BC Partners 获得 4 亿美元投资
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，BC Partners 的信贷部门同意向足球头盔制造商 Riddell 提供 4 亿美元，这笔交易将使包括私募股权公司 Fenway Partners 在内的股东获得期待已久的回报。【原文：The credit arm of BC Partners agreed to provide $400 million to football helmet maker Riddell, in a deal that will give shareholders including private equity firm Fenway Partners a long-awaited payout, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 香港放宽更改身份证性别的手术要求
item.description: 香港放宽了变性人在官方身份证上更改性别的一些规定，但仍保留了强制进行某些类型手术的要求。【原文：Hong Kong eased some rules for transgender people in order to change their gender on official ID cards but maintained a requirement mandating some types of surgery.】

item.title: 汇丰银行告知香港股东仍将关注股息问题

】

item.title: 欧元区通胀率逼近 2%，关注 6 月减税政策
item.description: 欧元区通胀放缓幅度超过预期，巩固了欧洲中央银行 6 月份降息的前景。【原文：Euro-area inflation slowed more than expected, cementing prospects for an interest-rate cut by the European Central Bank in June.】

item.title: 世界劳动力市场逆势而上，迫使降息押注重启
item.description: 发达国家大部分地区的劳动力市场持续超出预期，从而推低了对降息的押注，因为各国央行终究能实现软着陆的希望越来越大。【原文：Labor markets across most of the developed world just keep on beating expectations, pushing back bets on interest-rate cuts as hopes grow that central banks can pull off a soft landing after all.】

item.title: 多伦多房价自 7 月以来第二次月度上涨
item.description: 多伦多房价连续第二个月上涨，原因是购房者在适应了较高的抵押贷款利率后，他们之间的竞争有所加剧。【原文：Toronto home prices rose for a second straight month as competition between buyers picked up after they adjusted to higher mortgage rates.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行受高额租金影响将削减新加坡大厦面积
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由于新加坡金融中心的商业租金不断上涨，法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）将放弃新加坡一座黄金办公楼的空间。【原文：BNP Paribas SA is set to give up space in a prime office tower in Singapore amid rising commercial rent in the financial hub, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国放宽汽车贷款比例以促进电动汽车行业发展
item.description: 中国放宽了个人购车的贷款比例，以促进汽车行业的发展，尤其是电动汽车的发展。【原文：China relaxed the loan ratios for personal vehicle purchases as the country seeks to boost its automotive sector, particularly electric vehicles.】

item.title: 印度煤矿公司计划 7.2 亿美元出售可再生能源部门

item.title: 马来西亚总统纳吉布寻求在软禁状态下服刑
